text:
```
**VizBot.JS** 
 Welcome to the Vizbot.JS help system 
 ---------- 
 All commands are prefaced by a greater than symbol (>) and must be written in lower case E.G >help would bring up this help menu. 
 
 >help :- Brings up this help menu 
 >kick <@USER_NAME> :- Kicks the mentioned user from the Discord server 
 >warn <@USER_NAME> :- Warns the mentioned user  
 >add<NUMBERS SEPERATED BY SPACES> :- Will add together given numbers 
 >subtract<NUMBERS SEPERATED BY SPACES> :- will subtract given numbers 
 >multiply<NUMBERS SEPERATED BY SPACES> :- will multiply given numbers 
 >divide<NUMBERS SEPERATED BY SPACES> :- will divide given numbers 
 >say<INPUT> :- Forces the bot to repeat user input 
 >purge :- Clears the last 100 comments from the text channel 
 >avatarurl :- Provides the user with a link to their Discord avatar 
 >dice :- Rolls two dice and gives you the result 
 >bottest :- used for testing the bot connectivity```
